channel.description: Recent content in convert on ftisiot ideas about food and life

item.title: How to convert an array to a JSON array in PostgreSQL
item.description: PostgreSQL® offers two types of data types to handle JSON data, JSON and JSONB, you can use the function array_to_json (array_to_jsonb for JSONB) to create a JSON array from an existing array.

item.title: How to convert a table row to JSON in PostgreSQL®?
item.description: PostgreSQL® offers two types of data types to handle JSON data, JSON and JSONB, you can use the function to_json (to_jsonb for JSONB) to convert a table row to a JSON object.
